channel.title: Hamachi game
channel.description: guys plz teach me hota make a hamachi game and also the run.bat of any6 source aint working they used to now they rnt plz help for allstar everytime i click copyofrunserver.bat it comes and quickly goes down it nvr used to plz help i need it

item.title: Hamachi game
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Pure Slay:

They made this genius thing, it’s called batch code. With this mighty batch code you could replace “exit” with “pause” and see the magical white text that appears on your black console.

item.title: Hamachi game
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“mstcool 2, post:4, topic:414278”][quote author=Pure Slay link=topic=516242.msg3746265#msg3746265 date=1315723093]
They made this genius thing, it’s called batch code. With this mighty batch code you could replace “exit” with “pause” and see the magical white text that appears on your black console.
[/quote]

i did tht but still the same thing happens is this how u do it

@echo off
color 0a
title Allstar-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

if not plz send me the right 1[/quote]

@echo off
color 0a
title Allstar-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
@pause

Read full topic
